Container.Name: sys-API
Container.Overview:
This is the server backend for the Android app Monitee. System API (sys-API) provide a GraphQL API to your computers hardware.
It publishes and monitors values from OSHI with the help of Spring. On Windows the information is supplemented with OpenHardwareMonitor with a bit of help from OhmJni4Net.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.krillsson.monitee

Config.Name: Devices
Config.Description: To allow sys-API to monitor HDD devices

Config.Name: Mounts
Config.Description: To allow sys-API to monitor filesystems

Config.Name: Logs directory
Config.Description: To allow sys-API to read log files. Has to be specified in configuration.yml

Config.Name: Udev path
Config.Description: To allow sys-API to read device names from udev
